questions.text: Welcome traveller to the land of akoland!

answers.text: Who are you? Where am I?
Thank you for the warm welcome?
Fuck off!
Take your time, do not answer.

questions.text: I am your guide. You're in the land of akoverse.

answers.text: Are you real? well I probably am just dreaming.
Is this some joke stunt?
Take your time, do not answer.
Go away, I dont want a Paimon IRL.

questions.text: Quite rude arent you? I'm tryna teach you something here.

answers.text: idk bruv, am I?
You're quick to catch on
and so?
Sorry, I didnt want to sound off rude. I am just very confused.

questions.text: Okay, You must be curious about who I am and where are you right? I am your guide and you're in the land of akoverse.

answers.text: Are you real? well I probably am just dreaming.
Is this some joke stunt?
Take your time, do not answer.
Go away, I dont want a Paimon IRL.

questions.text: Oh, a silent observer? How amusing.

answers.text: Stay silent, dont make any moves.
You're quick to catch on
Stay silent but, show a surprised expression.
Being calculative is in my bones.

questions.text: Okay, lets break the silence, I am your guide and you're in the land of akoverse.

answers.text: What do we do now?.
Take your time, do not answer.
Please tell me more about this place.

questions.text: You can get a list of commands by typing a!help. Furthermore, Please pick what you want to learn about.

answers.text: I want to learn about the basics, I am new to the bot.
I'm not really a newbie nor a veteran. Is there something for me?

outcome.text: Quite full of yourself aren't you? Try to take a decision on selecting your race. Use a!tutorial again to start where you left off.

answers.text: I'm a veteran, I know almost everything about the bot, entertain me.

outcome.text: Take off your pants. (You can use a!tutorial again to start where you left off.)

answers.text: I'm an expert, show me how to get rich quickly.

outcome.text: KYS, (Keep yourself safe!) This world is harsh. (You can use a!tutorial again to start where you left off.)

questions.text: Now, lets pull 2 familiars using the gacha system. Type, a!gacha and pull 2 normal familiars.

answers.text: Click to simply proceed with the gacha

outcome.text: Alright, tutorial progress saved! You can use a!tutorial again to start where you left off anytime or continue after pulling 2 familiars.

answers.text: I'm not really a newbie nor a veteran. Is there something for me?

outcome.text: Quite full of yourself arent you? Try to take a decision on selecting your race. Use a!tutorial again to start where you left off.

answers.text: I'm a veteran, I know almost everything about the bot, entertain me.
I'm an expert, show me how to get rich quickly.

outcome.text: KYS, (Keep yourself safe!) This world is harsh.

questions.text: Now, after selecting your race, use the command a!sc (select class) to select a class, and then use a!tutorial again to start where you left off.

answers.text: Click to proceed with selecting a class.

outcome.text: Alright, tutorial progress saved! You can use a!tutorial again to start where you left off anytime or continue after selecting a class.

answers.text: Click to proceed with the gacha system.
Click to skip selection tutorial.

outcomes.text: Welcome back to the tutorial! assuming you've selecting your race (a!sr), use the command a!sc (select class) to select a class. Use a!tutorial again to start where you left off.

answers.text: Click to proceed with selecting a race.

outcome.text: Alright, tutorial progress saved! Press do it to pop up the race select menu.
